name: CRASH-BALL
description:
You find yourself back in your darkest nightmare, in front of areas full of contaminated scrap and rubbish. Your aim is to get rid of all that waste by cleaning them up, one after one. Only by this way you will free Mr Art Symbold from his scrap-iron prison. All you possess is your mind, your index finger and this legendary crash-ball, which you must throw.

There are 100 fast-paced episodes full of fun, adventure and traps which you must overcome. Be it laser, sawing, gravity disorder, death clouds and more. Checkpoints and hidden features will help you to get the job done, but first you will have to catch them. Do you dare to face the challenge by starting the game? And be aware, only the brave shall be victorious!
